projects.title: Paid-It
projects.description: App Web that allows you to manage finances and payments on educational institutions. Also allows to parents to deposit money to their childrens.

projects.title: SnapSnap
projects.description: Mobile App that allows you to take a picture and share it with your friends in a specific topic.

projects.title: SnapSnap API
projects.description: API that allows you to manage all the backend of the SnapSnap App.

projects.title: WeirdoComics
projects.description: ERP Web App to manage a Comic Store. Made with Laravel.

projects.title: Diary
projects.description: Simple Web App that allows you to write your thoughts and save them in a diary.

projects.title: WikiCar
projects.description: Blog to share information about cars with car lovers. App made with raw PHP.

projects.title: CalQ
projects.description: Java Calculator App to make simple operations, and geometric, convertions, equations, statistics, probabilities and more.

projects.title: SVG-Generator
projects.description: Simple python script to generate SVG/PDF files from a spreadsheet or CSV file to a SVG template.

projects.title: Mc Cullough-Pitts Neuron
projects.description: Simple Mc Cullough-Pitts Neuron to simulate a logic gates. Evaluated with a truth table and adjusts the weights and bias.

projects.title: Simple Perceptron
projects.description: Simple perceptron to solve logic gates problems.
